name: Enough Software
tag_list: app-development, android, ios, iphone, bada, html5, apps, windows-phone, windows-8, mobile-java, application-development, j2me-polish, porting
overview:
Enough Software was founded in 2005 as one of the pioneer companies in the mobile software industry. A team of 20 engineers and designers, design, develop, and port mobile apps for every purpose, on any platform: Android, BlackBerry, HTML5, iOS, J2ME, Samsung bada, Windows Phone and Windows 8.

As open source enthusiasts, the company also offer tools to the mobile community. The core product in that area is J2ME Polish, a development framework that overcomes the device fragmentation barrier and provides design, customization, and rapid development of features to all mobile Java developers. Glaze UI is a framework that enables BlackBerry Java developers to easily create stunning user interfaces for BlackBerry devices.

Last, but definitely not the least, the “Mobile Developer’s Guide to the Galaxy”, beloved by the mobile community, was inititated and is maintained by Enough. The guide serves as an objective and up-to-date introduction to mobile app development for developers and decision makers, alike, everywhere.

Their roster of customers include companies such as Nokia, Motorola, Telefonica, Qualcomm, Huawei, Vodafone and Volkswagen.

The city center of Bremen in north-western Germany is home to their office.
